body:
{
  "accountId" : "013024094748",
  "filename" : "mytemplate.yml",
  "template" : "AWSTemplateFormatVersion: 2010-09-09
Resources:
  Ec2Instance:
    Type: AWS::EC2::Instance
    Properties:
      InstanceType:
        Ref: InstanceTypeParameter01
Parameters:
  InstanceTypeParameter01:
    Type: String
    Default: t2.micro
    AllowedValues:
      - t2.micro
      - m1.small
      - m1.large
"
}
